title: My boards profile is broken.
body: I cannot view any of Even's past posts or comments on any account I login to. Why?

replies.body: We’ll get your profile synced as soon as the break is over! Thanks for the report!

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=rbbhY3KN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-29T01:41:43.161+0000)
>
> We’ll get your profile synced as soon as the break is over! Thanks for the report!

Thanks, I think its because of my name change.

Nothing's showing up for me, either. That's...

(•\_•) 
( •\_•)>⌐■-■ 
(⌐■\_■)

...odd.
